Title: The Rider's Journey
Description:
Excellent, just excellent! I will return the other eggs to their nests, undisturbed.

In the meantime, deliver your egg to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum.
ObjectivesText: Return to Instructor Skythorn at the Arboretum in the Jade Forest.
CompletionText: The wild cloud serpents live in a delicate balance with nature. Their rare eggs are quite vulnerable to enemies.
RewardText:
Ah yes, Elder Anli mentioned that a new student had joined our ranks. I see you have already chosen your cloud serpent egg.

I will instruct you on its care. Let me see it for a moment.
